reasoning: BPH is a chronic progressive condition best measured by prevalence. Age-dependent (50% of men in 50s, 80% in 80s). Global prevalence ~13% of adult men, or ~6,500 per 100k total population.
source: Roehrborn CG (2005). Benign prostatic hyperplasia: an overview. Rev Urol. 7(Suppl 9):S3-S14
